comment: National Socialist, you idiot. No NSDAP documentation uses the word "Nazi", Hitler himself never used the word "Nazi". It was always "Nationalsozialismus". "AshkeNAZI Jews" doesn't prove anything.
amr:

                        :op1 "National"
                        :op2 "Socialist"))
            :ARG2 (y / you

            :ARG1 (u / use-01

                                    :op2 "SDAP")))
                  :ARG1 (w / word

            :ARG2 (u2 / use-01
